Chest (Major).name: Barbell Bench Press
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Lie flat on bench, feet planted. 2. Grip bar slightly wider than shoulders. 3. Unrack and hold above chest. 4. Lower slowly to mid-chest, elbows 45°. 5. Pause briefly. 6. Press explosively to start. 7. Repeat. Inhale down, exhale up.
Chest (Major).tips_tricks: Retract scapulae. Use spotter on heavy sets. Never bounce bar off chest or flare elbows.

Chest (Major).name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Set bench 30-45°. 2. Grip slightly wider than shoulders. 3. Lower bar to upper chest. 4. Press up, squeezing upper chest. 5. Repeat.
Chest (Major).tips_tricks: 30-45° is best for upper chest. Keep butt on bench. Use 10-20% less than flat bench.

Chest (Major).name: Decline Barbell Bench Press
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Secure legs on decline bench. 2. Lower bar to lower chest. 3. Press powerfully up. 4. Repeat.
Chest (Major).tips_tricks: Great for lower chest thickness. Use safety bars or spotter.

Chest (Major).name: Dumbbell Bench Press
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Lie flat, dumbbells above chest. 2. Lower to sides of chest. 3. Press up until dumbbells nearly touch. 4. Squeeze chest. 5. Repeat.
Chest (Major).tips_tricks: Fixes imbalances. Greater ROM than barbell.

Chest (Major).name: Incline Dumbbell Press
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Set bench 30-45°. 2. Press dumbbells up and slightly inward. 3. Lower to upper chest. 4. Repeat.
Chest (Major).tips_tricks: Best upper-chest builder. Keep elbows tucked.

Chest (Major).name: Decline Dumbbell Press
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Secure feet. 2. Lower dumbbells to lower chest. 3. Press up powerfully. 4. Repeat.
Chest (Major).tips_tricks: Creates lower chest shelf. Use spotter to hand dumbbells.

Chest (Major).name: Dumbbell Flyes (Flat)
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Lie flat, slight elbow bend. 2. Lower in wide arc until deep stretch. 3. Hug back up. 4. Squeeze chest at top.
Chest (Major).tips_tricks: Light weight only. Never drop below bench level.

Chest (Major).name: Incline Dumbbell Flyes
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Incline 30-45°. 2. Lower in wide arc. 3. Squeeze upper chest on way up. 4. Repeat.
Chest (Major).tips_tricks: Upper-chest isolation. Strict form, light weight.

Chest (Major).name: Decline Dumbbell Flyes
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Decline bench. 2. Lower wide arc. 3. Bring up squeezing lower chest. 4. Repeat.

Chest (Major).name: Cable Crossover (High to Low)
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Cables high. 2. Pull down and across body. 3. Cross hands at bottom. 4. Slow return. 5. Repeat.

Chest (Major).name: Cable Crossover (Low to High)
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Cables low. 2. Pull up and across. 3. Squeeze upper chest. 4. Repeat.

Chest (Major).name: Pec Deck / Butterfly
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Sit, forearms on pads. 2. Bring pads together. 3. Squeeze hard. 4. Open slowly. 5. Repeat.
Chest (Major).tips_tricks: Adjust seat so handles at mid-chest. Exhale on squeeze.

Chest (Major).name: Dips – Chest Version
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Lean torso forward 30°. 2. Lower until shoulders below elbows. 3. Push up. 4. Repeat.
Chest (Major).tips_tricks: Lean = chest focus. Add weight belt when strong.

Chest (Major).name: Push-Up
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Hands wider than shoulders. 2. Lower until chest nearly touches floor. 3. Push up. 4. Repeat.
Chest (Major).tips_tricks: Elevate feet = more chest. Diamond = inner chest.

Chest (Major).name: Close-Grip Bench Press
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Grip shoulder-width. 2. Lower to lower chest, elbows tucked. 3. Press up. 4. Repeat.

Chest (Major).name: Plate Squeeze Press
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Lie flat, squeeze plate between palms. 2. Press up while squeezing hard. 3. Lower slowly. 4. Repeat.

Chest (Major).name: Hex Press
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Lie flat, press hex dumbbells together. 2. Press up maintaining contact. 3. Lower. 4. Repeat.
Chest (Major).tips_tricks: Inner-chest squeeze. Keep dumbbells touching entire rep.

Chest (Major).name: Svend Press (Standing)
Chest (Major).instructions: 1. Stand, squeeze plate between palms at chest. 2. Press forward. 3. Return slowly. 4. Repeat.
Chest (Major).tips_tricks: No equipment needed. Great activation or finisher.

Chest (Minor – Inner/Lower Focus).name: Diamond Push-Up
Chest (Minor – Inner/Lower Focus).instructions: 1. Hands together forming diamond under chest. 2. Lower chest to hands. 3. Push up. 4. Repeat.
Chest (Minor – Inner/Lower Focus).tips_tricks: Inner chest + triceps. Knees version for beginners.

Chest (Minor – Inner/Lower Focus).name: Wide-Grip Push-Up
Chest (Minor – Inner/Lower Focus).instructions: 1. Hands wider than shoulders. 2. Lower chest to floor. 3. Push up. 4. Repeat.
